use.flag: You can disable the use of the `binary` package using `-f-binary`. Disabling this is an unsupported configuration, but it may be useful for accelerating builds in sandboxes for expert users. If disabled we will not supply an instance of `Binary`.

You can disable the use of the `hashable` package using `-f-hashable`. Disabling this is an unsupported configuration, but it may be useful for accelerating builds in sandboxes for expert users. If disabled we will not supply an instance of `Hashable`.

You can disable the use of the `template-haskell` package using `-f-template-haskell`. Disabling this is an unsupported configuration, but it may be useful for accelerating builds in sandboxes for expert users. If disabled we will not supply an instance of `Lift`.
